data.name: Eschaton
data.detailed_description:
"I have come to tell you that you are free. Many ages ago, My consciousness left man, that he might develop himself. I return to find this development approaching completion, but hindered by fear and by misunderstanding."

Your final gift to humanity, stolen from you in it's final moments. An unheard of conspiracy spanning millennia snuffed in it's final act, only to be reborn.
It's the 23rd of May, 2023 and you are about to end the world.



Eschaton is a surreal, mystery exploration game set in the Scottish Highlands. Find clues, hidden objects and unveil secrets about what has happened. A short, nonlinear experience wherein the player can choose where to go and what to do.


Featuring

  • A short experience with a lot of hidden secrets
  • Explore an 'abandoned' Scottish manor house and grounds and find clues and hidden objects
  • Speak to the dead, speak to the living, and speak to yourself
  • Surreal conspiracy themed lore that definitely doesn't include any hidden symbology
data.about_the_game:
"I have come to tell you that you are free. Many ages ago, My consciousness left man, that he might develop himself. I return to find this development approaching completion, but hindered by fear and by misunderstanding."

Your final gift to humanity, stolen from you in it's final moments. An unheard of conspiracy spanning millennia snuffed in it's final act, only to be reborn.
It's the 23rd of May, 2023 and you are about to end the world.



Eschaton is a surreal, mystery exploration game set in the Scottish Highlands. Find clues, hidden objects and unveil secrets about what has happened. A short, nonlinear experience wherein the player can choose where to go and what to do.

data.short_description: Eschaton is a short, surreal first-person exploration game. Explore the 'aftermath' of a cult ritual in the grounds of a manor in the remote and picturesque Scottish highlands.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: AMD ATHLON 200GE
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
  • Additional Notes: Headphones recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics Card
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Dedicated
  • Additional Notes: Headphones recommended

content_descriptors.notes: Some scenes of gore and blood
